description: Try our easy to follow Easy Cheesy Mushroom Arancini recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Arancini & croquette,Microwave,Deep fryer,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Rice,Mushroom,Peanut free
name: Easy Cheesy Mushroom Arancini Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Empty rice into a medium heatproof bowl. Add mushroom soup and stir to combine. Microwave for 3 minutes. Stir cheese through mixture until melted. Stir through half the parsley and season to taste.
Cover and refrigerate until firm, approximately 1-2 hours.

Scoop 11/2 tbs of mixture and form it around a cube of mozzarella. Roll in flour, dip in egg, shake off excess, then cover in panko crumbs. Repeat with remaining mixture. Heat oil in a medium saucepan to 180Â°C. Deep fry arancini in batches for 2-3 minutes or until golden. Drain on paper towel, season with salt and sprinkle with remaining parsley. Serve with mayonnaise and lemon wedges on the side.
